tossup_question: -  Energy –  During physics lab, you create a graph of the kinetic energy of a bouncing ball versus time. What physical quantity is represented by the slope of the graph?
bonus_question: -  Energy –  Identify all of the following four processes that result in a decrease in entropy: 1) freezing of water; 2) vaporization of water; 3) extraction of magnesium and pure water from sea water; 4) sublimation of dry ice.
